name: Twilight Princess Statue Puzzle
author: Alucard648
info: ZC adaptation of statue puzzle from Zelda: Twilight PrincessMade on request by SkyFlare
description: Do you remember that statue puzzle that guards Master Sword in Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess? That is it. Stand on remote controller, then press Ex2 to rotate all statues anti-clockwise, or press Ex1 to move each statue one combo in direction they facing, unless obstructed. Beware of collisions! Land all statues on trigger spaces simultaneously to solve the puzzle.Update 9.6.2022 - Jumping animation for statues and support for inherent trigger flags.Update 12.12.2022 - Kill controls on puzzle solving
setup: 1. Surround puzzle area with NoPushblocks flags. .2. Place flags 62 - 65 (Pushblock, one direction, many) to define starting position and orientation of statues.3. Flag trigger spaces with flag 66 (Block trigger).4. Set up 4 combos in sequence for statues Up-Down-Left-Right5. Place FFC with TP_StatuePuzzle scriptD0 - ID of 1st statue combo (statue facing upwards, step 4)D1 - Music to play until puzzle is solved.
